full_summary:
### TBIPS – Stream #5 (Project Management Services)

#### Project Title: 
TBIPS – Stream #5 (Project Management Services) - Chief Information Officer and Security Branch (CIOSB) Application Services

#### Solicitation Number:
NRCan-5000072223

#### Note: 
The solicitation was expired on [2023-03-08T14:00:00](mailto:2023-03-08T14:00:00). You will no longer be able to submit responses.

Summary 
------------------------

The Solicitation title, NRCan-5000072223, was put out by Natural Resources Canada for the project: TBIPS – Stream #5 – Project Management Services. This project falls under the category of services, specifically IT project management. It is classified as a technical services contract that requires vendors to provide a particular skill set as outline by the generalized system of trade, and (G-S-T code D302A).

### Category
This solicitation is part of the category of Service (SRV).

This solicitation was open to vendors under agreement: the Comprehensive and progressive agreement for the partnership on the Pacific (CPTPP) as well as Canada- Ukraine free trade agreement (CUFTA), Canada – Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada – Colombia free trade agreement (CCFTA) among others.

**Regions**
This solicitation  was for service to be delivered within the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Business Opportunities**
All suppliers, who are qualified and willing to participate, can submit their proposals. Interested parties can obtain a copy of the solicitation at the following link: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/7444ae77c191cce8333c840e4511f85a/npp_tbips_nrcan_5000072223_en.pdf

### Contact Information
For more information, contact Daniel Burley, by phone at 343-543-7809, or by email at Daniel.Burley@canada.ca.
